para.p: Was package loaded the first time? Expect whichpkga.sty: [loaded whichpkga.sty].
Did it load a 2nd time? Expect cleared: cleared.
Did it load from subdir? Expect subdir/whichpkga.sty: [loaded subdir/whichpkga.sty].
Did it load a 2nd time? Expect cleared: cleared.
And of course the flag has been: cleared.
